news.title: AT THE GATES' TOMAS LINDBERG Dead At 52
news.summary:
Tomas Lindberg, the influential voice of Swedish melodic death metal pioneers At The Gates, has died following a battle with adenoid cystic carcinoma (ACC). 
 The post  AT THE GATES' TOMAS LINDBERG Dead At 52  appeared first on  Metal Injection .
